title: Sr Business Analyst
description: \n**W2 candidates only** About the Position: The position is for an experienced Technical Business Analyst within the financial industry. As a Technical Business Analyst, you serve as a liaison between the subject matter expert and application development. In this role you will be responsible for analyzing business requirements, functional requirements and working with application developers to deconstruct current-state system logic. Based on this analysis, you will be responsible for grooming technical stories/specifications to support our CWM Client Account Opening work-stream. As part of this work-stream, you may work on multiple projects at the same time that may be in different phases of the SDLC, and you will work with a cross-functional (Application Development, Quality Assurance, Scrum Master, Product Owner, Architecture/Design Authority, etc.) and cross-LOB team (Digital Technology, Wealth Management Technology, Operations, etc.).Key ResponsibilitiesAs a Technical Business Analyst for the CWM Client Account Opening team additional responsibilities will include: Analyzes business requirements to understand the business needs and to determine how systems and applications can best functionally fulfill those needs Combines knowledge of what the business wants with knowledge of how current-state system logic/design to groom technical stories/specifications for the target-state system Serve as the primary liaison between the Business, Architecture, Development and Testing teams throughout the project life cycle Strategizes with the business for the optimization of system processes; Identify efficiencies and ways to improve BAU design and system flow Identifies, assesses, and documents business requirements and functional/technical specifications; recommending business priorities, and advising business on options, risks, and costs Schedule and lead requirements & sessions with stakeholders; gather testable system requirements and translate them into use cases in user stories & gherkin Analyzes impact of proposed solution across the business and develops use cases to demonstrate the business requirements to the technology teamsQualifications: 5+ years of experience in information technology with an emphasis on Technical Business Systems Analysis Prior experience in financial / banking institutions (preferably in Wealth Management), preferably with client account opening process knowledge  Demonstrated ability with gathering and analyzing Business and Data Requirements across multiple applications and technologies throughout the full SDLC of projects Self-starter who with a proven track record in analytical thinking, problem solving and communication and experience in dealing with both senior executives and their teams Style that promotes a culture of collaboration and teamwork Strong written and verbal communication skills combined with solid project management ability Ability to manage to tight deadlines with a mind-set for flexibility Advanced knowledge of collaboration tools like Confluence and JIRA. Experience in the Agile Scrum methodology Experience/understanding of business process reengineering and business modeling concepts, business systems development and analysis Experience in BDD & TDD is a plus Knowledge of SQL is a plus   About TEKsystems:Join TEKsystems®, a leading IT staffing, IT talent management and IT services firm, and get your career on the fast track. title: Splunk Engineer
description: \nTop Three Skills:1. Hands-on security engineer with 4-5 years of hardcore Splunk engineering background2. Analyzing use cases and creating them based on the data.Plus: Cloud familiarity The global head of Cyber Analytics in the logging and ops area is looking for two Splunk engineers. title: Cloud Security Engineer (W2 Only)
description: \nOur client is currently seeking a full-time Cloud Security Engineer to join their e-commerce division. On a day to day basis, this person will be responsible for application vulnerability scanning and cloud authentication. Because of the rapid growth within the E-commerce division, there is a heightened need for extra Information Security protocols and scanning. The infrastructure environment on site is cloud-based with both AWS and Azure. The main tool used for vulnerability scanning is Nexpose/Rapid7 and Azure AD, OAuth, and OpenID are used for authentication.One of the most critical components of this role is collaboration - engineers on this team must be able to conduct their scans using the appropriate tools and then physically walk over to the development teams to discuss their results. title: Service Desk Analyst Day Shift
description: \nOne of our major Healthcare clients in NYC is looking for an outgoing Level 1 Help Desk support Analyst to join the hospitals Enterprise Service Desk. This individual will serve as the front-line IT support for the Health Systems 11 hospitals. On a day to day basis, the successful candidate will monitor and answer the Service Desk phone, e-mail message queues and automated triggered request queues. Aside from this, the Help Desk Support Analyst will provide support and customer service to users (Doctors, nurses, medical technicians and corporate employees), promote and escalate problems, incidents and requested action items. The client is looking for someone that they can train to become a level 2/3 systems analyst as well as train them on the various clinical/business applications. In speaking with the hiring manager, the Help Desk Support Analyst will manage level 1 service requests from report to resolution:* Receive, prioritize, document and actively resolve end user requests* Answer calls or e-mail contacts within the required service level time frame* Triage requests to ensure accurate transfers and escalation* Track open tickets and monitor ticket progress and close ticket items when problems are resolved* Follow escalation an paging proceduresProvide support and service to end users, seeking to resolve as many calls as possible at level 1* Provide support for issues related to password resets, MS Office, Windows, security access to printers, printer queues and business/clinical applications.* Identify problems for submission to problem management process   About TEKsystems:Join TEKsystems®, a leading IT staffing, IT talent management and IT services firm, and get your career on the fast track. title: GRC Manager
description: \nOur client is looking for a GRC Manager to support Information Security and Risk Management by maintaining and enforcing the Information Security and risk management framework/methodology, including execution of risk analysis and risk mitigation strategies.Responsibilities Include:Support Information Security and Risk Management by maintaining and enforcing the Information Security and risk management framework/methodology, including execution of risk analysis and risk mitigation strategies.Document and maintain the enterprise security risk governance methodology and risk management policy, process, and procedure.Exhibit best practice risk management skills through effective internal risk controls, risk monitoring, risk assessment and improvement of risk management processes.Organize and perform the enterprise security risk assessment and gap analysis for all technologies, products, and functions introduced, including maintaining risk project work plans to measure and manage progress.Track and document all internal risk reviews, assessments, risk acceptances, and security exceptions in a GRC tool.Serve as the information security liaison and subject matter expert for all relevant EMR and PHI related security risk.Conduct or participate in all relevant audits and risk assessment activities (whether operational risk, legal/compliance risk, reputational risk, or information security risk).Aid in the planning and execution of risk remediation activities including the identification of practical, cost effective solutions.Facilitate team meetings between stakeholders, project leaders, and the Information Technology teams.Attend regular team, management, and project meetings and provide both verbal and written reports to the Leadership Team as required. This may include coordination with and support of an Operational Risk Committee.Participate in emergency preparedness and disaster recovery planning exercises.Keep informed on current threats and industry regulations.Conduct and document investigations into potential privacy incidents and policy violations where needed. description: \nW-2 ONLY!! 3RD PARTY VENDORS NEED NOT APPLY.LARGE ENTERPRISE COMPANY - Project from Inception Project Description:The Integrated Case Management (ICM) team within Compliance Technology specializes in Trade Surveillance. This team is tasked with creating a tool to track the complaints filed against internal employees. By having a systematic approach in place to keep track of these complaints, the company will save large sums of money. This is a large-scale, global project that is projected to be completed in around 2 years. description: \nTop 3 Skills:1. 3-5 years troubleshooting experience within a Mac/Apple enterprise environment support including working with JAMF for iPad.2. 3-5 years experience troubleshooting within a windows enterprise environment including Active Directory support of policies, OUs, profiles, and objects3. 3-5 years experience supporting a virtualized environment within VMware: troubleshoot guests, hosts, and the SAN which is based on a VM. The ideal candidate has had some exposure to JAMF including:Know how to classify a IOS deviceBe able to distribute content remotely to IOS devicesKnow how to remote wipe a deviceClassify each device in proper location and verifyGet remote information on the IOS deviceHow to purchase/acquire apps and assign to specific groups of IOS devicesSearch inventoryEnroll IOS devices in proper groupsCreate Device ProfilesUpdate Configuration ProfilesThe other district is primarily a Dell/Windows environment. This person will be responsible for adding/removing users, working with objects and OUs, as well as some group policy management.There is VMware in the environment as well as a SAN that based virtually.
